Software Product Lifecycle Guide

This guide walks through typical stages and offers specialized crews to help.

Stages

  • Ideation — High-level ideas, problem definition, goals
  • Requirements & Roadmap — Define scope, prioritize, plan roadmap
  • Design & Architecture — Technical designs, architecture decisions
  • Implementation / Development — Coding, code review, incremental delivery
  • CI / Automated Tests — Builds, unit/integration tests, linting
  • Staging / QA — Manual and automated acceptance tests before release
  • Release — Canary, gradual, or full release
  • Production Operations — Monitoring, observability, incident response

Crews

  • Code Review Crew — Specializes in automated + human code review and recommendations.
  • Product Dev Crew — Focuses on product decisions, prioritization, and delivery practices.
  • Technical Experts Crew — Masters of architecture and choosing the right tooling for production.
